name: apivoid
label: apivoid
description: Apivoid connector provides several threat intelligence services ranging from IP/URL/Domain reputation to domain age and website screenshots

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server
fields.description: IP address or FQDN of the Apivoid cloud Platform.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.decsription: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.,

operations.title: Get ThreatLog Domain Reputation
operations.description: Query ThreatLog.com database of malicious domains

operations.title: Get Domain Reputation
operations.description: Check if a domain name is blacklisted by trusted sources

operations.title: Get IP Reputation
operations.description: Check the reputation and geolocation of an IPv4 address

parameters.title: IP Address
parameters.name: req_value
parameters.description: IP address for which you want to retrieve reputation information.

operations.title: Get URL Screenshot
operations.description: Take high-quality screenshots of any web page and URL

parameters.title: URL
parameters.name: req_value
parameters.description: URL for which you want to capture the screenshot.

operations.title: Get URL Reputation
operations.description: Identify potentially unsafe and phishing URLs.

parameters.title: URL
parameters.name: req_value
parameters.description: URL for which you want to retrieve reputation information.

operations.title: Get Domain Age
operations.description: Get domain registration date and domain age in days

parameters.title: Domain Name
parameters.name: req_value
parameters.description: Domain name for which you want to retrieve registration date and domain age.

operations.title: Get Domain Trustworthiness
operations.description: Provides important details about a website to check if it is legit.

operations.title: Get Domain Parked Status
operations.description: Check if a domain name is parked/for sale/Inavtive.

operations.title: Get URL Status
operations.description: Check if an URL is online or offline (down or not accessible).

parameters.title: URL
parameters.name: req_value
parameters.description: URL for which you want to check.

operations.title: Get Email Reputation
operations.description: Find out if the email is disposable, suspicious/risky, valid format, and more.

parameters.title: Email Address
parameters.name: req_value
parameters.description: Email ID for which you want to retrieve reputation information.

operations.title: Get DNS Propagation
operations.description: Check if DNS records of a domain have propagated globally.

parameters.title: Record Type
parameters.description: DNS records type: A, AAAA, NS, MX, TXT, SRV, PTR, SOA, CNAME, SPF, CAA
parameters.name: dns_record_type

operations.title: Get URL HTML
operations.description: Capture the HTML page source after JavaScript has been executed.

parameters.title: URL
parameters.name: req_value
parameters.description: Specify the URL whose HTML page needs to be captured.

operations.title: Get SSL Info
operations.description: Check if a website's SSL certificate is valid, expired or blacklisted.

parameters.title: Domain Name
parameters.name: req_value
parameters.description: Specify the website whose SSL info needs to be validated.
